homepage.heading: The ultimate font playground for designers and creators
homepage.body: Explore, compare, and preview thousands of fonts — all in one place. No downloads, no hassle. Just pick your style and see your ideas in action, faster than ever.

one.title: Open Source Fonts
one.description: Browse a curated collection of open-source fonts ready for any project. Powered by Fontsource, you get access to reliable, well-maintained font files without licensing headaches.

two.title: Self-Hosting Install
two.description: Easily install fonts locally with a single command. No external calls, no delays — just the speed and control of hosting your own fonts, directly from Fontsource packages.

three.title: Live Preview Playground
three.description: Test and compare fonts in real time before adding them to your project. Adjust sizes, weights, and styles instantly, so you can make the perfect choice without guesswork.
